Japanese denim jeans from Allevol are the pair to have. Made from Japanese raw or selvedge denim, these jeans are produced with the finest materials, hand-crafted by denim specialists in trusted traditional Japanese methods. The Allevol Japanese selvedge raw denim fabrics are made by old woven shuttle looms for natural fade, as well as excellent durability. The jeans are made in Okayama, sewn by vintage Union machines for an authentic finish. You will love these Japanese denim jeans, they are a class in themselves, check them out on Allevol right now. You will fall in love with the texture, the color of the Japanese denim. Use our discount coupon to buy a pair today!
